pages.title: Charging with Heat
pages.text: If you've got an excess of $(item)Chili Powder$() building up, and don't want to use it all on one $(o)really$() spicy sandwich, throw it in a $(item)Fire$(). The residual magicks of this place will cause it to transform, imbuing it with a peculiar charge, making this new $(item)Redstone$() powder useful for anything remotely mechanical.
